content: this blanket in weight 2 yarn measures 140x140 cm / 55x55 inches hook 3 5 mm amount of yarn approx 5280 m / 5740 yds please note the final amount of yarn you will need depends on a your crochet gauge b yarn c hook size this pattern will be available for free on my blog vcrochetpatterns com jan23-feb28 this is paid ads free pdf option
